install.name: Custom HTMLfor JBolo
install.author: Joomla! Project
install.description: Custom HTML JBolo Module. This allows you to add the module on the chat-bar

param.name: img_path
param.label: Module Icon Image Path
param.description: This will be the source of the image, which you want to show in the front end as the module icon

param.name: mod_link
param.label: Module Link
param.description: This will be link of the module seen in the front end
